remarks: Definition of a topology generated by a basis in [Munkres] p. 78.  Later we show (in ~ tgcl ) that ` ( topGen `` B ) ` is indeed a topology (on ` U. B ` ; see ~ unitg ).  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jul-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
tgval2 $p |- ( B e. V -> ( topGen ` B ) = { x | ( x C_ U. B /\ A. y e. x E. z e. B ( y e. z /\ z C_ x ) ) } ) $.
$d B x y z $.
$d V x y z $.
$d x y $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
